title: Hydration Hero
description: Complete your first water goal (8 cups)

title: Perfect Day
description: Complete both water and calorie goals in one day

title: Water Warrior
description: Drink 10+ cups of water in a day

title: Hydration Habit
description: Meet water goals for 7 consecutive days

title: Aqua Master
description: Meet water goals for 30 days total

title: Calorie Champion
description: Meet calorie goals for 7 consecutive days

title: Balanced Week
description: Meet all macro goals for 7 consecutive days

title: Weekend Warrior
description: Complete goals on both Saturday and Sunday

title: Consistency King
description: Log meals every day for a week

title: Macro Master
description: Hit perfect macro ratios (40/30/30) for a day
